scripts._comment: 'nodemon --watch blockchain -e js api.js rs' - if drive is not mounted drive or core drive of system. npm start command is used to check the regualar working/ working at single node
scripts.node_1: nodemon --legacy-watch blockchain -e js networkNode.js rs 3001 http://localhost:3001
scripts.node_2: nodemon --legacy-watch blockchain -e js networkNode.js rs 3002 http://localhost:3002
scripts.node_3: nodemon --legacy-watch blockchain -e js networkNode.js rs 3003 http://localhost:3003
scripts.node_4: nodemon --legacy-watch blockchain -e js networkNode.js rs 3004 http://localhost:3004
